00022 #include <time.h>
00023 #include <stdlib.h>
00024 #include <stdio.h>

00027 #ifdef WIN32
00028 #pragma warning(disable: 4996) // ignore deprecated functions warning
00029 #define snprintf _snprintf
00030 //need to include winsock2 before windows.h (pulled in by affy-base-types)
00031 #include <winsock2.h>
00032 #include <process.h>
00033 #define getpid _getpid
00034 #define gethostid() 0
00035 #else
00036 #include <unistd.h>
00037 #endif

00039 #include "Guid.h"

00042 
00043 #define SEEDVAL(VAL) do { \
00044   unsigned int val=(unsigned int)(VAL); \
00045   if (val!=0) { \
00046     seed=seed*val; \
00047   } \
00048 } while (0)
00049 
00050 using namespace affxutil;
00051 
00052 /*
00053  * Initialize the socket library.
00054  */
00056 Guid::Guid()
00057 {
00058 #ifdef WIN32
00059         // initialize Winsock library
00060         WSADATA wsaData;
00061         WORD wVersionRequested = MAKEWORD(1, 1);
00062         int nResult = WSAStartup(wVersionRequested, &wsaData);
00063 #endif
00064 
00065 
00066         // Since we are using "*" we want to avoid zero...
00067 
00068         // the pid is included for the case where two processes
00069         // start up in the same second. 
00070         unsigned int seed;
00071         // start with a number...
00072         seed=314159; 
00073         // add more sources of randomness here.
00074         SEEDVAL(time(NULL));
00075         SEEDVAL(getpid());
00076         SEEDVAL(gethostid()); // this is zero on darwin
00077         srand(seed);
00078 
00079 }
00080 
00081 /*
00082  * Clean up the socket library.
00083  */
00084 Guid::~Guid()
00085 {
00086 #ifdef WIN32
00087         WSACleanup();
00088 #endif
00089 }
00090 
00091 /*
00092  * Create a new guid based on the host name, current time and random numbers.
00093  * A checksum of the string values are taken so as to remove any user
00094  * interpretive information. This should strictly just be an identifier.
00095  */
00096 GuidType Guid::GenerateNewGuid()
00097 {
00098         const int GUID_LENGTH = 54;
00099         char guid[GUID_LENGTH+1];
00100         time_t currentTime;
00101         const int MAX_HOST_NAME = 64;
00102         char hostname[MAX_HOST_NAME];
00103         static bool seeded = false;
00104         currentTime = time(NULL);
00105         /* Make sure we're not seeding with 1 every time (default on linux) */
00106         if(!seeded) {
00107           srand(currentTime);
00108           seeded = true;
00109         }
00110         gethostname(hostname, MAX_HOST_NAME);
00111 
00114         snprintf(guid,sizeof(guid), "%10d-%10d-%10d-%10d-%10d",
00115                 CheckSum::OnesComplementCheckSum(hostname, strlen(hostname)/2),
00116                 (int) currentTime, rand(), rand(), rand());
00117         guid[GUID_LENGTH] = 0;
00118         for (int i=0; i<GUID_LENGTH; i++)
00119         {
00120                 if (guid[i] == ' ')
00121                         guid[i] = '0';
00122         }
00123 
00124         return GuidType(guid);
00125 }
